all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
For as Jonas was three days and three nights in the whale’s belly; so shall the Son of man be three days and three nights in the heart of the earth.
Matthew 12:40
Quote of the Day
"I invite you to consider the role of the Holy Ghost, specifically related to gospel learning and teaching in the home and at church."
Brother Chad H Webb | 1 Oct 2025General Conference
